extension.name: OPC Tracking - Google JSON-LD
extension.author: RuposTel.com
extension.description: Google JSON-lD Data Generation for Product Pages. This plugin will generate a proper Google JSON-LD data into your product details page. It is recommended to pair your categories with Google Taxonomy for best results. Important: Enable to run at the product pages below. Set your ID format to be consitent with Google Merchant feeds, GTM or GA tracking.

param.name: desc_type
param.label: Use long description or short
param.description: Decide if to use long product description or short product description within generated code

param.name: show_rating
param.label: Show rating
param.description: Show product rating within JSON+LD data
